channel.title: Account Resetting HELP
channel.description:
After server crashes/resets some people login to be in pitch black and accounts reset, can anyone tell me how i can stop this?
I think it could be thier accounts get saved at sametime as crash so it resets as it cant save properly, if this is the case can someone make a code which kicks people 30 seconds before server reset and doesnt let them on untill after it resets?

item.title: Account Resetting HELP
item.dc:creator: @Fruity Fruity
item.description:
@Fruity wrote:

I let it reset every 30 mins incase it crashes…

Read full topic

item.title: Account Resetting HELP
item.dc:creator: @sebaleon sebaleon
item.description:
@sebaleon wrote:

dont allow the server to reset…fix it!

Read full topic

item.title: Account Resetting HELP
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

im not sure if there is a code for it (at least to my knowledge, theres not) but try haveing them type a tele command, like ::fish or something. that sould work…if it doesnt, im not sure what to do.

Read full topic
